text: The Wii Shop Channel was a digital storefront for the Nintendo Wii. It offered digital game titles, called WiiWare, exclusively for the Wii and games from older consoles available in the "Virtual Console" catalog. The storefront was opened on November 19, 2006, and closed on January 30, 2019. == References == Category:2006 establishments in Japan Category:2019 disestablishments in Asia Category:Video game memes
title: Wii Shop Channel
